title: Interpretation of crying in a dream by leading imams of interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of crying in a dream Opinions differ regarding the interpretation of crying in a dream, and from the great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and other imams, some of them see it as a praiseworthy vision of the Prophet, and others see it as a vision warning him of the arrival of problems that will sadden him. Whoever sees Ibn Sirin’s opinion on seeing crying in a dream in general, this article deals with a detailed explanation of the interpretation of crying in a dream through the website of the major imams in several places: Interpretation of crying in a dream If the dreamer cries while performing the obligatory prayer, this is a sign of his desire for sincere repentance and increased closeness to God. Crying loudly and burning in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and problems affecting the dreamer’s heart. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he cannot shed his tears and that they are trapped inside his chest, then this vision indicates his failure to get rid of his problems. Crying in a dream if it is accompanied by a loud scream This indicates calamities and extreme sadness. If the crying in the dream is without a sound, then this vision is praiseworthy and indicates relief after distress and the removal of worries. Ibn Sirin believes that the best interpretation of crying in a dream is for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried woman sees that she is crying without a sound, this is good news that Get married soon. If an unmarried woman sees that she is crying, but her tears fall coldly, this is a sign of her freedom from troubles and sorrows, and soon I will be pure of joy. It is also believed that the bad interpretation of crying in a dream is for unmarried women. When an unmarried woman sees herself crying with a loud voice Loud and heartfelt, this indicates that she will delay her marriage. Perhaps seeing her crying loudly in a dream indicates that she has committed a sin that has angered God. Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is crying without a sound, this is a good sign that childbirth is near. And happiness and joy enter her home. But if she sees that she is crying loudly and cutting off her black clothes, this indicates her bad luck and anxiety, and this vision is not praiseworthy at all. Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a man. Ibn Sirin believes that an unmarried man crying in a dream indicates His wedding date is approaching. His vision differs from the interpretation of crying in a dream. If the man is married, then this vision may indicate travel or it indicates reconciliation between him and many people, including disputes and disagreements. What are the opinions with which Imam Nabulsi agrees with Ibn Shirin in interpreting a dream about crying? If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is being slapped On his face, or wearing a black dress, or screaming, then this dream is interpreted as intense sadness. If the dreamer sees that he is crying and is affected by hearing the Holy Qur’an, or by praying, or that he is screaming in grief over a sin he committed, then this dream is interpreted as joy and death from Extreme concerns for him. The Prophet. Ibn Shaheen and his interpretation of the dream of crying. Ibn Shaheen believes that the interpretation of crying in a dream with intense burning for another person and a loud screaming indicates the poor psychological state of the dreamer at that time. If the dreamer sees that

title: Opening the door with a key in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: We will mention the signs and indications of seeing the key through your gptafser.com/ website, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing opening the door with the key in a dream for a single girl When a single girl sees herself opening the door without difficulty in a dream, this indicates that she will achieve the goals and dreams she wants. Perhaps she will open The door easily in her dream symbolizes her repentance and that she will see changes for the better in her life. What is available in one dream is considered a sign of achieving goals in professional life, God willing. But if she sees herself buying the key in a dream, this indicates a new job with status. High. And if she sees her lover giving her the key in a dream, this symbolizes her official engagement, and God knows best. But losing her key in her dream symbolizes haste in making a decision, which gives her unsatisfactory results. Losing the key in a dream may mean quitting work, and God knows best. This may be the case. A sign for her that she will lose her boyfriend. Because of her mistreatment and she needs to treat others better. If a girl sees that one of the young men is giving her the key to the dream. Perhaps this dream is a sign of marriage or engagement with this young man, or entering into an emotional relationship, God knows best. And when she sees that she took the key from one of her companions, this shows the help she is providing until she gets through her crisis. If she really suffered from an epileptic seizure while seeing this dream. As for the car key of single women in a dream, it symbolizes the upcoming prestigious job, and God I know. But if the girl searches for the car key, this indicates that she has acquired a lot of knowledge, God willing. The car key in the dream may have different meanings. It may mean marriage to a person who owns a car. Or it may be a sign that a car will reach her, God willing. The iron key For a virgin girl, the sign of marriage to a man who will help her, God willing. See also: Interpretation of dreams about opening a door without a key. Interpretation of seeing a door opened with a key in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees a key in a dream, this means that she will get a lot of money, God willing. And it may be the key for a married woman A new job is on her way, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she has found a key in a dream, this means that she will get new things in her life. It could be a new house or a car, and God knows best. Seeing that a woman’s husband gives her a soft, flat key is a sign that This husband takes the right of days and is characterized by injustice. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a key in a married woman’s dream indicates power and prestige. Presenting the key to someone in a dream symbolizes the abundance of the offer that she will receive, God willing. Seeing the key being handed over is a symbol of the stability of the marriage. Finding the key on the road symbolizes her possession. New Arabic God willing. If a married woman sees the key in the door of the house, this indicates the possibility of moving into a new house. title: What is the interpretation of the veil in a dream for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of the veil in a dream for a single woman, and what does it mean to see a white, red, and embroidered veil in a dream? This is what we discuss in our article through a special encyclopedia, that wearing the hijab for a Muslim woman means a lot to her, as the jacket is a symbol of purity and a desire to get closer to God Almighty. Do not look at her with eyes that do not fear God. So what about the interpretations of the hijab in a dream that we refer to in our article, so follow us. Interpretation of the hijab in a dream for a single woman. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained seeing the hijab in a dream for an unmarried woman as: a state of calm and psychological stability, as well as purity, chastity, and honor. As The interpreter of dreams, Ibn Sirin, referred to the interpretation of the veil in an unmarried woman’s dream as good news that will make her happy and pleased in reality, and God is higher and higher, and He knows the unseen. Seeing a colored veil in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes: the happiness that dominates the dreamer’s life in reality, and God knows best. Especially this: To add color to a girl’s dream, it shows many good things flowing in the dreamer’s life in reality, and God is the Knower of the Unseen. They symbolize Watching washing the veil in the dream of an unmarried girl means; He repented to God and asked Him for forgiveness. He wants to get closer to God Almighty, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Conclusion: Seeing buying a hijab in an unmarried girl’s dream transforms her life into a qualitative shift that brings her psychological stability and peace. She enters a stage full of joy and the darkness of the soul dissolves, and God knows best. Especially seeing a torn hijab in a dream An unmarried girl's vision does not bode well. Since it symbolizes the psychological suffering that makes her look at things from a narrow perspective, causing her disappointment and sadness, she must seek help from Almighty God and rely on Him for great forgiveness, and God knows best. The point of seeing the veil disappearing in an unmarried girl's dream: To me; The girl did not continue to satisfy her desires or God prevented her from those desires, and God alone is supreme and most knowledgeable. Wearing the hijab and taking it off in a single woman’s dream indicates that the vision of wearing the hijab in one dream is not covered in reality. It is time for her to approach God Almighty and wear the hijab or follow the behavior that brings her closer to God Almighty, and the Lord is Most High and Most Knowing. Specify a vision of not wearing the hijab in a dream even though she is wearing the hijab in this? In reality, he is suffering and must turn to God with abundant forgiveness and sincere repentance, and God knows best. While Sheikh Al-Nabulsi explained the vision of the veil in the dream of an unmarried woman by saying that: This girl enjoys Hajj or Umrah and visiting the House of God. Seeing the bride’s veil in an unmarried girl’s dream, according to Sheikh Al-Nabulsi, indicates that: God will make her happy, grant her success, and live her life according to God’s command, and God knows best and knows best. The black veil in a woman’s dream, I mean seeing herself wearing a black veil in Dream of an unmarried girl: The emergence of many challenges and difficulties that she faces in her life, and these difficulties will quickly disappear, and God knows best. Seeing a black veil in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates. The financial problems he is experiencing

title: Interpretation of a dream about breaking magic by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about breaking a spell: Seeing a dream about breaking a spell during sleep is one of the visions that cause panic and fear in the dreamer and a feeling of dread due to the interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about breaking a spell: If someone sees a vision of breaking a spell in a dream, it is one of the shameful visions that does not bode well for its owner at all. It indicates that the dreamer is committing some taboos and sins and has not stopped them for a long time. If the dreamer sees in a dream breaking magic, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is taking a forbidden path and it will lead him to actions that will anger God. When a person sees in a dream a dream about breaking magic, then this vision It serves as a warning and a warning to him from some hypocrites in his life who claim to be virtuous while they are the opposite. Interpretation of a dream about breaking magic by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of breaking magic as the dreamer searching for things and actions that will lead him to destruction and falsehood. If the dreamer sees breaking magic in a dream, the vision It suggests that the dreamer follows lies, is deceived by the desires of the world, and does not care about the afterlife. This vision also explains that the dreamer earns forbidden money from misguidance and sin. Seeing magic in a dream indicates serious disasters and tribulations that will enter the dreamer’s life during this period and he must beware of some people in his life. Interpretation of a dream about breaking magic for a single woman: If she sees an unmarried girl in Her dream is to undo magic. This vision symbolizes that she is a strong person and carries a lot of responsibility. She can bear them easily and is characterized by intelligence and a thinking mind. Seeing undoing black magic in one person’s dream indicates that she is one of those people who does not take advantage of the good opportunities that come her way, as it appears. The vision is that she has hypocritical friends who do not wish her success. And evil returns to her. If the fiancée sees that her fiancé is performing magic, then this vision indicates that he is evil and deceitful and she must divorce him. When a girl sees in her dream that there is magic buried in her room and she dissipates it, the vision indicates that she is doing forbidden things and following the desires of this world, ignoring the afterlife. Interpretation of a dream Magic spells for single women: If an unmarried girl sees someone casting magic spells on her in a dream, this is a sign that her sorrows and anxiety will soon end, God willing. If a virgin dreams that she is reciting a magic spell in a dream, this vision indicates that she is going through some obstacles and trials, but God will comfort her. From her distress and she will overcome all these problems, God willing. When the dreamer sees in a dream that she is sending a telegram to someone she does not know, the vision is one of the praiseworthy visions that portends her approaching marriage to a good, pious and virtuous person. Interpretation of a dream about breaking a spell for a married woman. Seeing a break from a spell In a dream for a married woman, it is not a good omen at all, as this vision indicates marital disputes that will arise between her and her partner during this period. If a married woman sees the breaking of magic in a dream, this vision is evidence that the dreamer will be exposed to serious health problems and may lead to some complications. Permanent. When a married woman sees herself breaking the spell in a dream, this sign

title: Interpretation of seeing coal in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing coal in a dream: Coal is considered a flammable material, as it is black in color, and is used in many uses. Coal is widely used in heating and baking work, and it can have the ability to burn for a long time. There are many types of coal found all over the world. Its origin can be traced back to sedimentary rocks, and it should be noted that seeing it in a dream can bring many clues and interpretations to the viewer. Interpretation of seeing coal in a dream Coal can be widely used in many daily uses for humans and is usually used in heating processes to get rid of the cold. Seeing coal in A dream can be considered as evidence: It can be considered a harbinger and bad news for the fortuneteller, represented by the forbidden money that the fortuneteller will obtain. While a man may consider it the power of the king, or the power of the dreamer. It is also a sign of the fortuneteller falling into many false and wrongful deeds. It should be noted that a dream about coal Of the dreams whose signs vary depending on the dreamer’s evidence. Burning coal in a dream can also be considered a good sign of useful knowledge that will benefit the dreamer in his life. Also, the dream interpretation of coal can be considered a dream that indicates the abundance of life. However, the ashes that come out of burning coal , may indicate the abundance of life and livelihood for the pioneer. While burning coal is a good sign of life changes that the viewer will face. Burning coal is also a sign of the persecution that will befall the monarch from the ruler of the country. Al-Nabulsi explained that coal in the winter is a sign of sustenance and goodness. For the pioneer. While collecting coal is considered one of the signs that indicate the charitable work carried out by the dreamer. Also, collecting coal is evidence of the abundance of sustenance for the Lord. It is one of the signs of the dreamer’s love for the good in others. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Al-Hawawshi in a dream in detail by the most famous interpreters. Interpretation Providing coal in a dream: One of us may see many dreams that may be forced to obtain meanings, and the people who carry them in turn may refer to many people, which is what was indicated in Giving coal to a dream. It may indicate the following: Coal is one of the signs that may indicate forbidden money that may The fortuneteller obtains it. While he came to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of useful coal that is used in many human uses, which indicates the obstacle that the monarch will acquire. While burning coal can be considered a sign of participation in many forbidden actions. It also indicates that the dreamer will bear false witness. While if the dreamer collects a lot of love in a dream, it can be considered a sign of problems and difficulties that he will face. However, Imam Al-Sadiq may consider collecting firewood and coal a sign that the monarch will be responsible for fateful decisions. If an unknown man gives a single woman luxury, it is a sign that she will get married From someone you do not know. Whereas if a man gives his wife coal, this indicates that their lives will suffer from many problems. It should be noted

title: Interpretation of applying hair henna to single women

preview.html: In this article, we will learn about the comprehensive interpretation of the dream of applying henna to the hand, foot, and hair for women and men, in addition to the interpretation of the vision of removing henna from the hair and body.Interpretation of seeing henna in the hair in a dream for a single girl. Henna in general in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of her purity and good reputation among the people. Henna inscriptions symbolize happy news and occasions, God willing. Applying henna on the hair in a single woman’s dream is good news for her because she is about to achieve her dreams. And that God Almighty will give her whatever she desires soon. Black henna for the hair and hands in a dream is evidence of her approaching engagement. And in Once she is engaged, it is time for her to get married, and God knows best. It is said that blonde and red henna for single women is a sign that she will be engaged soon. Applying henna to all parts of the body is undesirable and indicates many fears. See also: Interpretation of seeing hair in a dream and its importance to Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing henna applied to Hair in a married woman’s dream: Putting henna on the hair in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her married life. The family is calm and stable and its financial situation is good. Al-Nabulsi says if the woman is sick and puts henna on her hair in a dream. May God ease her pain and heal her soon, God willing. If the woman who If she delays childbirth, she puts henna in her hair. This is good news for the woman who hears the news that she is pregnant with a boy, and God knows best. Putting henna on the hands and feet in a dream is not good. It indicates many worries and sorrows, and it is also said that it is sin and disobedience, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing henna in Hair in a man’s dream and its meaningImam Ibn Sirin says: Henna in people’s sleep is good, abundant food, a blessing in life, health, and offspring, God willing. When a man puts henna in his hair in a dream, he wants to appear with good appearance, noble morals, and a good personality in front of others. Applying henna to the mustache and beard in a dream is evidence that the dreamer maintains his prestige and reputation among the people, and God knows best. If a man applies henna to his fingers in a dream, he is asking for a lot of forgiveness and remembrance of God. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about cutting someone else’s hair. Meaning of seeing henna in Hair in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Applying henna in general in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that her birth is approaching. Whoever applies henna to her hair or hands in a dream will have an easy and smooth birth, God willing. Interpretation lawyers say that applying henna to the vagina in a pregnant woman’s dream heralds the birth of a girl. And whoever applies henna to her back, a child may come to her, and God knows best, and colored henna is good news that will come to her soon. Interpretation of the vision of applying henna to the hair in a dream for young people and its meaning. Ibn Shaheen says: If a young man applies henna to the front of his head in a dream, then he will enjoy modesty, secrecy, and strong faith. And whoever hennas his hair All of it in a dream was given to him by God as a righteous wife, and God knows best. Preparing henna in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is struggling and trying to get something. Whoever puts henna on his hand in a dream is good news of the death of worry and distress.

title: Interpretation of a connection in a dream: Seeing a connection with someone in a dream

preview.html: The concept of marriage, engagement, recitation of the Qur’an, emotional attachment and love, whether for a single girl, married, pregnant, divorced, married, single, celibate, or a strange young man, unknown or known. The man, and more than Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of the dream of engagement. The dream of sexual intercourse has many different interpretations for women and men, as seeing this dream has many repercussions and we will present it to you on our Al-Fariji website. Marriage and some other relationships are unsuccessful and end with negative results. Therefore, each vision of this dream has a different interpretation from the other, and this is what makes the dreamer recite this dream in detail. Interpretation of engagement in a dream for a single woman: A girl who sees herself in a relationship or getting married and the matter is good, then this is evidence of her marriage to a good young man who knows his religion correctly and has never been unfaithful. It takes into account religious customs. And customs related to marriage. Whoever sees in her dream that she is marrying someone but without seeing his features, this is great evidence that she is proposing an engagement to someone who is wrong, and this step will end in complete failure. Interpretation of an engagement in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is one of her relatives, this is evidence of That she will enjoy goodness and benefit from her husband, especially if this person has clear characteristics in the dream. In this with the family elsewhere, and in another way, if you marry the same husband in a dream, this is good news about the pregnancy that you will have soon. Interpretation of a relationship in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees that she will marry without a husband, this is evidence that she will have a lot from money. Whether her marriage to someone other than her husband is evidence that her husband will travel for work in the near future. Future. As for her marriage to her husband, this is evidence that God Almighty will give her the child she wants, whether it is female or male.

title: Interpretation of a dream about evening dresses

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing evening dresses in a dream is a vision that is constantly searched for on Google, as dresses are clothes for women in general and are worn on happy occasions such as engagement parties, weddings, birthdays, and evenings, and you may be interested in meeting. A child in a dream. Seeing evening dresses in a dream leads to a feeling of psychological comfort, because they are elegant and elegant clothes and the one who wears them is a woman with refined taste. It is necessary to know the interpretation of seeing dresses in a dream in detail. You may also be interested in: Library in a dream. Interpretation of seeing evening dresses. In a dream, the great honorable Arab scholars have interpreted many dreams in one dream, so the interpretation of a dream about evening dresses is as follows: Seeing red evening dresses in a dream indicates the intensity of the dreamer’s love for his desires that he wants to achieve in reality. As for black evening dresses in the dream, they It indicates a lot of disputes and disagreements between the fortuneteller and his neighbors. Evening dresses in a husband or wife’s dream are a sign that romance will return again after a state of boredom and indifference. Seeing a new evening dress that no one has worn is a sign of receiving happy news. Seeing an old evening dress Torn and dirty is a sign of recognition of the person who causes the dreamer to experience shock and sadness. An old black evening dress is a sign of great psychological tension in reality. Seeing evening dresses in more than one cheerful color is a sign for the dreamer that he will obtain a good position and prosper in life. May You would also be interested in knowing: The accident in a dream. Interpretation of seeing evening dresses in a dream. Interpretation of seeing colorful evening dresses in a dream. A colorful evening dress in a dream is a beautiful woman whom the dreamer will soon recognize. Seeing a white evening dress in a dream for a woman is a sign of her marriage. A green evening dress in a dream is a woman. Jamila adheres to the morals of her religion. Seeing a red evening dress in a dream means getting to know a woman who is very attractive because of her beauty, but she is a domineering, arrogant, and treacherous woman. Seeing a blue evening dress in a dream is a sign of psychological stability between parents and family, and this color symbolizes success and prosperity for the dreamer. Seeing a yellow evening dress in a dream is the marriage of a sick woman to a good man. Seeing a black evening dress in a dream is a sign of death and a serious illness, and this vision also represents hearing sad news. Black evening dresses in a dream are the enemy that surrounds the pioneer, and one must beware of it, as Seeing a black dress portends to the dreamer the death of one of his relatives or a fatal illness and after death. You may be interested: Insulting religion in a dreamInterpretation of seeing evening dresses in a dream for a single womanSeeing an unmarried woman in her dream wearing a very long evening dress is a sign of good behavior among people and a sign of her desire In achieving her goals after completing her studies. Blue dresses in an unmarried woman’s dream are a sign of her engagement to a rich man. You may be interested in: Flatulence in a dream, interpretation of visions

title: Interpretation of a dream about getting married at an early age

preview.html: Many people search for an interpretation of a dream about getting married at an early age, as marriage is a strong relationship between two parties, but when the dreamer sees that he will get married at an early age, the vision will be very surprising. Since there is no girl who does not think about her marriage, and from thinking too much, she can see it in her dream That she will get married at an early age, and it is one of the visions that is often repeated in a dream, and many people search for it to know what is hiding them, good or bad. Interpretation of the dream of getting married at an early age for unmarried women through the various website. We will learn about the interpretation of the dream of getting married at an early age in the following lines on As follows: An unmarried marriage at a young age indicates that she will get married in the future and that her husband will be healthy but not old. In addition to the family stability that this girl will enjoy and her reaching the highest positions as quickly as possible. Also, it can indicate Marriage at an early age in a dream indicates a significant delay in the age of marriage. Interpretation of a dream about marriage at an early age for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about marriage at an early age for a married woman is considered one of the most wonderful dreams, so the couple will search for an interpretation of this dream, and we show you the interpretation of a dream about marriage at an early age from Yes, married as follows: She says that if she marries another husband at an early age, this means that she will achieve what she wants and reach her goals and desires, or move to a new home or a new promotion at work. But if she sees that she is married in a dream with her husband at the age of Early, this indicates his promotion at work, travel, or a lot of money and livelihood. In general, it is good for all family members, whether husband, wife, or children. Interpretation of a dream about getting married at an early age for a pregnant woman. Many pregnant women see many visions in their dreams, and among the most famous These visions mean that the pregnant woman will marry again at an early age, so we will show you the interpretation of this dream as follows: Whoever is pregnant and sees in her dream that she will marry at an early age without her husband, this indicates the gender of the boy and that she will give birth to a female. If she sees that she will marry a woman Before her husband at an early age, this indicates that she will give birth to a son. The vision also indicates imminent birth and ease of childbirth if it is in the last months. If she gives birth to children and believes that she will marry again, this indicates the marriage of her son in the near future, the joy of the son, and a new life for the mother and children. Interpretation of a dream about marriage at an early age for a divorced woman: Divorce in life can indicate evil or injustice, but if a divorced woman sees in her dream that she will marry again, especially if she sees that she will marry at an early age, she can search for this vision, we will show you marriage. The interpretation of a dream at an early age for a divorced woman is as follows: If a divorced woman sees herself getting married at an early age to her ex-husband, this indicates that she will return to him. If she sees that she has married a man she does not know, this indicates achieving goals and ambitions and obtaining a new job or a promotion in Work, and this may indicate her happiness in her new life. Marrying a divorced woman at a young age

title: Interpretation of barley in a dream: Eating barley in a dream

preview.html: The vision of barley for single women, married women, pregnant women, and divorced women, whether they eat barley bread or wheat bread. Bring the dough to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of barley in a dream. Barley is money with a healthy body for those who eat it or eat it, and it is better than wheat. Some of them said that it was born short-lived because it was the food of Jesus, peace be upon him. Who dreams? If he has eaten dry, wet, or fried barley, then he is doing well, and it is good in any case. Whoever dreams of enjoying barley, then he will gain strength and a healthy body and do good. And whoever dreams of harvesting barley, then it will be righteousness, benevolence, and a fruitful year, especially if it comes at the right time, and he will harvest money in its time. It refers to him, and God Almighty has a right to that, according to the Almighty’s words: {And give him his due on his day. Planting it indicates an act that requires God’s approval. Wet barley is a fertile material, and buying henna is a great harm. Whoever walks in planting barley or one of the crops: jihad diet. A dream about barley is in any case good, beneficial, and nourishing. It is in a dream good livelihood, urgent, a little tiring. Whoever dreams that he sells wheat for barley is one who has forgotten the Holy Qur’an and is preoccupied with poetry. Whoever dreams of taking barley will have a blessed son, but he will not live long. It was said: Barley is money for the health of the body. Buying barley is great wealth, and harvesting it at the right time is the money made in it. Whoever grows barley does what pleases God Almighty and collects money or does good for the authority. Wet barley is a fertile material and barley is a good feeling of health and well-beingBarley If you dream of barley, you can expect good days full of joy and success. But if you dream that you are drinking wet barley, it means that you will start an adventure and emerge from it safe and sound. If one dreams that he sees a field of barley, this means that he is asking for a great desire and that he will obtain it. If one dreams that he is in a field of barley, this means that his efforts and steps It will turn into a great success. If a person dreams that he sees a field of barley but it is rotten, this means that he will suffer a great loss in all his work and in everything he desires. Interpretation of barley in a dream for NablusHe will come to the book of perfuming livestock in the interpretation of the dream: Barley in a dream indicates a good diet. And less fatigue is the one who sees in a dream that he sold wheat for barley, and then in his wakefulness he exchanges good things. For something less than that, and it was also said that he forgot the Qur’an and worked on poetry. Whoever dreams that he is carrying barley in his palm or hand, then, God willing, he will be blessed with a child. As for buying barley in a dream, it represents permanent ownership or influence, and reaping it is quick-earning money. Barley in a dream is a feeling that something a lot of good will happen in it. Interpretation of barley in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said in his famous book (Interpretation of Great Dreams): Barley in a dream indicates permanent wealth and a healthy body for the one who sees that he is preserving it, gathering it, or eating it, and in the interpretation better. Despite wheat. Harvesting barley or collecting it in bags indicates money if the dream is at harvest time, and planting it means an act that requires the Creator’s satisfaction. Whoever sees in a dream that he is walking on land planted with barley, then by the grace of God he will receive the blessing of his hard work, and seeing barley in general indicates on
